GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

queries.author: filters articles by username
queries.sort_by: sorts articles by any valid column (defaults to created_at)
queries.order: specifies the sort order - either 'asc' or 'desc' (defaults to desc)

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a specific article by its id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments for a specific article ordered by most recent first

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a new comment to an article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the votes on an article by article_id
